Data Fields
pjsua_snd_dev_param Struct Reference
PJSUA API - High Level Softphone API » PJSUA-API Media Manipulation

#include <pjsua.h>

Data Fields

int capture_dev
 
int playback_dev
 
unsigned mode
 

Detailed Description

This structure specifies the parameters to set the sound device. Use pjsua_snd_dev_param_default() to initialize this structure with default values.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
  • pjsua-lib/pjsua.h
